title: The OA
brief_description: Prairie Johnson, blind as a child, comes home seven years after going missing with her sight restored. Some hail her a miracle, others a dangerous mystery, but Prairie won’t talk with the FBI or her parents about where she’s been.

constellations_other.name: Location and exploration
constellations_other.description: A comparative look at location-based gaming and street art and how the way we experience these two art forms has moved out of traditional spaces and onto the street.

description: Prairie Johnson, blind as a child, comes home to the community she grew up in with her sight restored. Some hail her a miracle, others a dangerous mystery, but Prairie won’t talk with the FBI or her parents about the seven years she went missing.
description_for_label: Prairie Johnson, blind as a child, comes home to the community she grew up in with her sight restored. Some hail her a miracle, others a dangerous mystery, but Prairie won’t talk with the FBI or her parents about the seven years she went missing.
